examples.sentence: A Zambian taught me how to cook nshima, their staple food.

The Zambian kwacha is one of the most colorful currencies.

examples.sentence: The zany in the circus deliberately tripped over giant bananas.

That zany tried to charge his phone with a potato battery.
The CEO's zany always laughs three seconds earlier than others.
Office zanies memorize the boss's coffee order as their top priority.
His zany TikTok videos always go viral for absurd reasons.

That zany prank involved 99 rubber ducks in the CEO's office.

examples.sentence: The alien zapped the spaceship with a laser beam.
This pesticide can zap mosquitoes instantly.

A bolt of lightning zapped the old tree.
The meme zapped everyone's attention at the meeting.
The drone zapped across the sky like a shooting star.
He zapped through 100 levels of the game in one night.
The new CEO brought fresh zap to the company.
This energy drink gives you instant zap.

Zap! The magician made the rabbit disappear.
Zap! The WiFi signal came back suddenly.
I zapped through all my emails during the subway ride.
This cream can zap away pimples overnight.
The volunteer's zeal for helping stray cats moved the whole neighborhood.

His zeal for collecting limited edition sneakers has turned his room into a museum.

Hotpot zealots claim that no food exists beyond spicy broth.
The tech zealot queued for three days to buy the latest smartphone.
Zealots in 70 AD chose mass suicide over surrendering to Romans.
The historian compared modern extremists to ancient Zealots.
The debate turned chaotic when political zealots started shouting.
This fitness zealot does 100 push-ups during TV commercials.

examples.sentence: The popularity of TikTok reflects the zeitgeist of short attention spans.
